logistics.title: Logistics & Shipping
logistics.description: End-to-end logistics management from origin to destination. We handle customs clearance, freight forwarding, and delivery coordination to ensure your products arrive on time and in perfect condition.

warehousing.title: Warehousing & Storage
warehousing.description: Climate-controlled storage facilities at strategic locations. Our warehouses maintain optimal conditions for agricultural commodities with real-time inventory tracking and quality monitoring.

processing.title: Processing & Packaging
processing.description: Custom processing and packaging solutions tailored to your specifications. From sorting and grading to custom packaging formats, we ensure your products meet exact requirements.

traceability.title: Traceability & Compliance
traceability.description: Full supply chain traceability with EUDR compliance. Track your products from farm to port with complete documentation and third-party verification for regulatory compliance.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Rigorous quality control at every stage. Our QA team conducts comprehensive testing and inspection to ensure products meet international standards and your specifications.

consulting.title: Trade Consulting
consulting.description: Expert guidance on international trade, regulations, and market entry. We help you navigate complex import/export requirements and optimize your supply chain strategy.

grading.title: Grading Standards
grading.description: All products are graded according to international standards (ISO, USDA, ICO) with detailed quality metrics for moisture content, defect rates, and physical characteristics.

testing.description: Comprehensive laboratory analysis including microbiological testing, pesticide residue screening, and nutritional analysis conducted by accredited third-party laboratories.

inspection.description: Independent pre-shipment inspection by SGS, Bureau Veritas, or other recognized inspection agencies to verify quality, quantity, and compliance before export.

documentation.title: Documentation & Traceability
documentation.description: Complete documentation package including certificates of origin, phytosanitary certificates, quality certificates, and full traceability records from farm to port.

eudr.description: The EU Deforestation Regulation (EUDR) requires companies to ensure that products sold in the EU are not linked to deforestation or forest degradation. We provide complete due diligence documentation and traceability for all our products.

about.title: About Afrexia
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for premium African agricultural commodities

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in Cameroon, Afrexia has grown to become a leading exporter of premium African agricultural commodities. With deep roots in local farming communities and a commitment to sustainable practices, we bridge the gap between African producers and international markets. Our mission is to deliver exceptional quality while supporting the livelihoods of smallholder farmers and promoting environmental stewardship.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To be the most trusted partner for African agricultural commodities, delivering exceptional quality, complete traceability, and sustainable value to our customers and farming communities.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Complete traceability from farm to port

governance.title: Governance & Structure
governance.subtitle: Committed to transparency and accountability
governance.content: Afrexia operates under a robust governance framework that ensures ethical business practices, regulatory compliance, and stakeholder accountability. Our management team brings decades of combined experience in agricultural commodities, international trade, and supply chain management.

partnerships.title: Partnerships & Memberships
partnerships.subtitle: Collaborating with industry leaders
partnerships.content: We are proud members of leading industry associations and maintain strategic partnerships with certification bodies, logistics providers, and agricultural cooperatives across Africa.
